title: Sembly AI
description: Meeting Notes is just the beginning! AI meeting notes, tasks, and more sent automatically to your favorite apps. Meet Semblian 2.0 🚀 Outsource your time‑consuming tasks to AI ✨ Sembly works with Zoom, gMeet, Teams and Webex.  Record, transcribe, and get AI-generated meeting minutes and summaries with Sembly Professional. Try Sembly Team to unleash the power of AI in business meetings to transform them into actionable insights.
